entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
